EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder. Your renewal time is coming up!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Renew Today With RapidAdvance
Thank You for your business. We look forward to continuing to serve your future funding needs..
Many of our customers don’t realize that they become eligible for a renewal when their account is only 60% paid off. You’re almost there! Please contact us or check your remaining balance online at www.rapidadvance.com to determine when you can get additional funding.
Over 85% of our eligible customers renew their advances multiple times. Now is the perfect time to start thinking about how much additional money you’ll need in the near future and how to put that money to work. Renewals are even easier and faster than your first advance with funding happening within 5 days.
Be sure to ask about our new services that may be able to provide you with even more funding options.
Referral Bonus:
Help out a fellow business owner and earn up to $400
Simply refer a fellow business owner to our service and earn
$400 if their funded advance is equal to or greater than $10,000 or Simple, "3 Minute" application.
$250 if their funded advance is less than $10,000.
There is no limit to the number of referrals you can submit.
Call your representative to submit a referral.
Thank you for the opportunity to support your business!
